404.intro: We're sorry, but the page you're looking for could not be found.
404.return_links_html: Go back to our {{ home_page_link }} or view our range of {{ products_link }}.

password.title: OPENING SOON
password.sub_title: Be an early bloomer! Find out about our launch before anyone else.

onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

fullscreen_slider.slide_1_tagline: Welcome to the Blockshop theme! To get started, we recommending having a bit more of a read about the theme and its features.
fullscreen_slider.slide_2_tagline: Content is divided in large customizable blocks giving you freedom to adjust layout, colour, typography and UI elements to represent your brand with boldness and clarity.

product_slider.title: Featured Products
product_slider.no_products_link: Click here to add some products to it.

featured_promotion.title: Customizable Widget Blocks
featured_promotion.description: The Blockshop theme boasts spacious layouts, block colors, bold typography with a minimal user interface that endures trends with simplicity and style. Content is divided into large customizable blocks giving you the freedom to adjust layout, color, typography and UI elements to represent your brand with boldness and clarity. Retina-ready and completely responsive the Blockshop is your one stop shop.

collections.no_collections_feedback: There are no collections in your store besides your Frontpage collection.
collections.no_products_feedback: You don't have any products yet.

products.size_chart_path: Theme settings > Product page > Size chart
products.empty_page_content_html: You haven't linked a page yet. To configure this you'll need to go to your {{ size_chart_path }} section.

sold_out.variant: This variant is currently sold out
sold_out.product: This product is currently sold out.
sold_out.form_notification: Thanks! We will notify you when it becomes available!
sold_out.form_description: Please fill in the form below if you'd like to be notified when it becomes available.
sold_out.feedback_invalid_email: Please provide a valid email address.
sold_out.email_description: Please notify me when this is back in stock

recently_added_popup.title: Recently Added
recently_added_popup.unavailable: The item you just added is unavailable. Please select another product or variant.

shipping_calculator.title: Shipping Calculator
shipping_calculator.rates_available: There are ${rates.length} shipping rates available for ${address}, starting at {{html Shopify.Cart.ShippingCalculator.formatRate(rates[0].price)}}.
shipping_calculator.one_rate: There is one shipping rate available for ${address}.
shipping_calculator.no_shipping: We do not ship to this destination.

comment.title: Leave a comment
comment.moderated_notice: Comments have to be approved before showing up
comment.moderated_feedback: Thank you for your comment. It will have to be approved by the blog owner first before showing up.
comment.success_feedback: Thank you, your comment has been posted.
comment.error: Not all the fields have been filled out correctly

contact_page.success_feedback: Thanks for contacting us! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_page.error_feedback: We were unable to send your message, please correct the following:
contact_page.name: Your Name

account.no_orders: You haven't placed any orders yet.

activate_account.subtext: Create your password to activate your account.

login.reset_instructions: We will send you an email to reset your password.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!
issued.redeem: Use this code at checkout to redeem your gift card

stock.items_unavailable_notice: Some items are no longer available. Your basket has been updated.

order_summary.cart_does_not_meet_discount_requirements: Your basket does not meet the requirements for the {{ code }} discount code

shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: There are no shipping methods available for your basket or destination.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your basket has been modified and the shipping rate you previously selected no longer applies. Please select a new rate.

unsubscribe.description: You won’t receive any more basket reminders from us.

payment.amazon_payments_login_hint: You will be asked to log in with Amazon.

cart.only_n_items_available: You can only add {{ count }} {{ name }} to the basket.
cart.all_items_in_cart: All {{ count }} {{ name }} are in your basket.
cart.too_many_line_items_error: Your basket can't contain more than {{ max }} items.
cart.stock_problems_html: One or more items are no longer available. We've provided an updated basket.
cart.shipping_address_not_required: This basket does not require shipping.
